snippet: The toymaker, facing criticism, said it would replace a piece from its Play-Doh Cake Mountain toy set.
abstract: Hasbro moves to replace element of its Play-Doh Cake Mountain toy set following wave of criticism from observers who felt it looked too much like a penis.
lead_paragraph: The toymaker, facing criticism, said it would replace a piece from its Play-Doh Cake Mountain toy set.

headline.main: Hasbro Is Replacing Toy Piece Many Think Resembles a Penis
headline.print_headline: Hasbro Is Replacing Toy Piece Many Think Resembles a Penis
